next 3 half_double_crochet repeat from * to end of round join with slip_stitch to first half_double_crochet 40 sts click for babies is a national grass roots campaign that partners with hospitals public health and child abuse prevention groups to create awareness of the leading trigger for infant abuse frustration with crying communities across north america donate handmade hats in shades of purple to raise awareness of the period of purple crying that all infants go through the period of purple crying is research-based new parent education regarding infant crying stress and frustration in the months of november and december hats are given to new parents along with the purple education for more details and to find local groups and cap requirements see http //www clickforbabies org 3
